ListRegions.summary: Queries the regions that are supported by App Streaming.

schema.description:
The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming
>  This parameter is not publicly available.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

ListRegions.title: ListRegions
ListRegions.description: >  All supported regions instead of available regions are returned by this operation. For more information, see [Supported regions](~~426036~~).

schema.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 200.
The page number. Pages start from page 1.
The ID of the delivery group.

The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

PerPageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

Count.description: The total number of entries returned.

NodeId.description:
The ID of the resource node.

>  This parameter is returned only if the ChargeResourceMode parameter of the delivery group to which the resource node belongs is set to Node.

ChargeType.description:
The billing method of the resource node.

>  This parameter is returned only if the ChargeResourceMode parameter of the delivery group to which the resource node belongs is set to Node.

Valid values:

*   PostPaid: pay-as-you-go
*   Prepaid: subscription

ListNodeInstanceType.summary: Queries the resource types that are available for purchase when you create a delivery group.

schema.description:
The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming
The number of the page to return.
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

The operating system that is supported.

Valid value:

*   Windows: the Windows operating system

The ID of the region where the resource resides. For information about the supported regions, see [Limits](~~426036~~).

Valid values:

*   cn-shanghai: China (Shanghai)
*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou)

The language that you want to use.

Valid values:

*   en-US: English (US)
*   zh-CN: Simplified Chinese
The resource type that you want to query. If you do not configure this parameter, all resource types are returned.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

PageSize.description: The number of entries on each page.

PageNumber.description: The page number of the returned page.

NodeInstanceType.description: The ID of the resource type.

NodeInstanceTypeFamily.description:
The resource type family.

Valid values:

*   appstreaming.general: WUYING - General
*   appstreaming.vgpu: WUYING - Graphics

MaxCapacity.description:
The maximum number of sessions to which a resource can connect at the same time. If a resource connects to a large number of sessions at the same time, user experience can be compromised. The value range varies based on the resource type. The following items describe the value ranges of different resource types:

*   appstreaming.general.4c8g: 1 to 2
*   appstreaming.general.8c16g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c16g.4g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c31g.16g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.14c93g.12g: 1 to 6

NodeTypeName.description: The name of the resource type.

ListNodeInstanceType.title: ListNodeInstanceType

schema.description:
The ID of the resource type that you purchase. You can call the [ListNodeInstanceType](~~428502~~) to obtain the ID.

You must specify one of AppInstanceType and NodeInstanceType. If you specify both of the parameters, the value of NodeInstanceType takes effect.

Valid values:

*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c16g.4g: WUYING - Graphics - 8 vCPUs, 16 GiB Memory, 4 GiB GPU Memory
*   appstreaming.general.8c16g: WUYING - General - 8 vCPUs, 16 GiB Memory
*   appstreaming.general.4c8g: WUYING - General - 4 vCPUs, 8 GiB Memory
*   appstreaming.vgpu.14c93g.12g: WUYING - Graphics - 14 vCPUs, 93 GiB Memory, 12 GiB GPU Memory.
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c31g.16g: WUYING - Graphics - 8 vCPUs, 31 GiB Memory, 16 GiB GPU Memory

The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming

The billing method.

Valid values:

*   PostPaid: pay-as-you-go
*   PrePaid: subscription
The subscription duration of resources. This parameter must be configured together with `PeriodUnit`.

The unit of the subscription duration. This parameter must be configured together with `Period`. The following items describe valid values for the combinations of `Period` and `PeriodUnit`:

*   1 Week
*   1 Month
*   2 Month
*   3 Month
*   6 Month
*   1 Year
*   2 Year
*   3 Year

>  The value of this parameter is case-insensitive. For example, `Week` is valid and `week` is invalid. If you specify a value combination other than the preceding combinations, such as `2 Week`, the operation can still be called. However, an error occurs when you place the order.
The number of resources to purchase.

The ID of the region where the delivery group resides. For information about the supported regions, see [Limits](~~426036~~).

Valid values:

*   cn-shanghai: China (Shanghai).
*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou)

The type ID of the sessions that you purchase. You can call the `ListAppInstanceType` operation to obtain the ID.

You must specify one of AppInstanceType and NodeInstanceType. If you specify both of the parameters, the value of NodeInstanceType takes effect.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

PriceModel.description:
The price object.

This parameter is returned only if a value is specified for NodeInstanceType.

DiscountPrice.description: The discount. The actual price is calculated based on the following formula: Actual price = Original price - Discount.

TradePrice.description: The actual price. The actual price is calculated based on the following formula: Actual price = Original price - Discount.

Selected.description:
Indicates whether the coupon was used.

Valid values:

*   true
*   false

RuleId.description: The ID of the price calculation rule.

Description.description: The description of the price calculation rule.

PriceList.description:
The price objects.

This parameter is returned only if a value is specified for AppInstanceType.

PriceType.description:
The price type.

Valid values:

*   Connected: in use
*   Standby: pending for use.

DiscountPrice.description: The discount. The actual price is calculated based on the following formula: Actual price = Original price - Discount.

TradePrice.description: The actual price. The actual price is calculated based on the following formula: Actual price = Original price - Discount.

Selected.description:
Indicates whether the coupon was used.

Valid values:

*   true
*   false

RuleId.description: The ID of the price calculation rule.

Description.description: The description of the price calculation rule.

GetResourcePrice.title: GetResourcePrice

GetResourceRenewPrice.summary: Queries the renewal prices of App Streaming resources.

schema.description:
The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming
The subscription duration of resources. This parameter must be configured together with `PeriodUnit`.

The unit of the subscription duration. This parameter must be configured together with `Period`. The following items describe valid values for the combinations of `Period` and `PeriodUnit`:

*   1 Week
*   1 Month
*   2 Month
*   3 Month
*   6 Month
*   1 Year
*   2 Year
*   3 Year

>  The value of this parameter is case-insensitive. For example, `Week` is valid and `week` is invalid. If you specify a value combination other than the preceding combinations, such as `2 Week`, the operation can still be called. However, an error occurs when you place the order.
The ID of the delivery group. You can call the [ListAppInstanceGroup](~~428506~~) operation to obtain the ID.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

DiscountPrice.description: The discount. The actual price is calculated based on the following formula: Actual price = Original price - Discount.

TradePrice.description: The actual price. The actual price is calculated based on the following formula: Actual price = Original price - Discount.

Selected.description:
Indicates whether the coupon was used.

Valid values:

*   true
*   false

RuleId.description: The ID of the price calculation rule.

Description.description: The description of the price calculation rule.

GetResourceRenewPrice.title: GetResourceRenewPrice

enumValueTitles.weekly: 周（每周指定几天重复执行一次定时任务）

enumValueTitles.Mixed: 混合模式，单VPC、双网卡+独立公网IP
enumValueTitles.Shared: 共享模式，单网卡、NAT网管访问公网

enumValueTitles.PDS: 网盘与相册服务（Drive and Photo Service）

PersistentAppInstanceScheduleMode.title:
持久会话调度模式。
DYNAMIC：动态调度 - 同一个持久会话可调度到不同节点上。
FIX_NODE：固定节点调度 - 同一个持久会话只能调度到固定的节点上。

400.errorMessage: The selected specification is out of stock. Please try again later or select other specifications.

500.errorMessage: Your request cannot be processed currently due to an error. Please try again later.

Scope.title:
标签类型。取值范围：
Custom：自定义标签。
System：系统标签。

GetAppInstanceGroup.title: GetAppInstanceGroup

ListAppInstanceGroup.summary: Queries the details of multiple delivery groups that meet the query conditions.

schema.description: The number of entries per page. The value cannot be greater than `100`.
The page number.
The status of the delivery groups.

items.description:
The status of the delivery group.

Valid values:

*   PUBLISHED: The delivery group is published.
*   FAILED: The delivery group failed to be published.
*   MAINTAIN_FAILED: The delivery group failed to be updated.
*   EXPIRED: The delivery group is expired.
*   MAINTAINING: The delivery group is being updated.
*   CEASED: The delivery group has overdue payments.
*   EXPIRED_RECYCLING: The delivery group is expired and being recycled.
*   DEPLOYING: The delivery group is being published.

schema.description: The ID of the delivery group.

The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming

The name of the delivery groups to query. Fuzzy match is used for queries. For example, if you set this parameter to `Office App`, all delivery groups whose names contain `Office App` are queried, such as `My Office Apps` and `Office App A`.

schema.title: 应用中心镜像ID
schema.description: The image ID of the app. You can obtain the ID from the Images page in the App Streaming console.

schema.title: 地域ID
schema.description: The region ID

The ID of the region where the delivery group resides. For information about the supported regions, see [Limits](~~426036~~).

Valid values:

*   cn-shanghai: China (Shanghai)
*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou)
The ID of the resource specification that you purchase. You can call the [ListNodeInstanceType](~~ListNodeInstanceType~~) operation to obtain the ID.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

PageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

items.description: The delivery group.
The app.

AppVersionName.description: The name of the app version.

AppCenterImageId.description: The image ID of the app.

RegionId.description: The ID of the region where the delivery group resides. For information about the supported regions, see [Limits](~~426036~~).

ProductType.description:
The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming

AppInstanceType.description: The resource type of the delivery group.

AppInstanceGroupId.description: The ID of the delivery group.

Amount.description: The number of subscription resources. Minimum value: 1.

MinAmount.description: The minimum number of instances. Minimum value: 1.

MaxAmount.description: The maximum number of instances. Minimum value: 1.

ReserveAmountRatio.description: The percentage of reserved instances. The value indicates the percentage of unused sessions in the delivery group. Valid values: 0 to 99.

ReserveMinAmount.description: The minimum number of reserved instances. The value indicates the minimum number of unused sessions in the delivery group. Minimum value: 1.

ReserveMaxAmount.description: The maximum number of reserved instances. The value indicates the maximum number of unused sessions in the delivery group. Minimum value: 1.

ScalingStep.description: The number of sessions that are created each time the delivery group is scaled out. Minimum value: 1.

ScalingUsageThreshold.description: The upper limit of session usage. If the session usage exceeds the specified upper limit, auto scale-out is triggered. The session usage rate is calculated by using the following formula: Session usage rate = Number of sessions in use/Total number of sessions × 100%. Valid values: 0 to 99.

ScalingDownAfterIdleMinutes.description: The duration for which no session is connected. Unit: minutes. If no session is connected in the resources after the specified duration elapses, auto scale-in is triggered. Minimum value: 0.

ChargeType.description:
The billing method.

Valid values:

*   PostPaid: pay-as-you-go
*   PrePaid: subscription

GmtCreate.description: The time when the delivery group was created.

Status.description:
The status of the delivery group.

Valid values:

*   PUBLISHED: The delivery group is published.
*   FAILED: The delivery group failed to be published.
*   MAINTAIN_FAILED: The delivery group failed to be updated.
*   EXPIRED: The delivery group is expired.
*   MAINTAINING: The delivery group is being updated.
*   CEASED: The delivery group has overdue payments.
*   EXPIRED_RECYCLING: The delivery group is expired and being recycled.
*   DEPLOYING: The delivery group is being published.

items.description: The resource group.

NodePoolId.description: The ID of the resource group.

NodeInstanceType.description: The ID of the resource specification that you purchase.

NodeAmount.description: The total number of subscription resources.

NodeUsed.description: The number of subscription resources that are in use.

NodeCapacity.description:
The maximum number of sessions that can be connected to a resource at the same time. If a resource connects to a large number of sessions at the same time, user experience can be compromised. The value range varies based on the resource specification. The following items describe the value ranges of different resource types:

*   appstreaming.general.4c8g: 1 to 2
*   appstreaming.general.8c16g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c16g.4g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c31g.16g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.14c93g.12g: 1 to 6

ScalingNodeAmount.description: The total number of scalable resources.

ScalingNodeUsed.description: The number of scalable resources that are in use.

StrategyType.description:
The type of the scaling policy.

>  `NODE_SCALING_BY_USAGE` is returned for this parameter only if ChargeType is set to `PrePaid`. `NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE` is returned for this parameter only if ChargeType is set to `PostPaid`.

Valid values:

*   NODE_FIXED: No scalable resources are used.
*   NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE: Scheduled scaling is used.
*   NODE_SCALING_BY_USAGE: Resources are scaled based on usage.

Amount.description: The number of resources purchased when the delivery group was created.

MaxScalingAmount.description: The maximum number of resources that can be created for scale-out.

MaxIdleAppInstanceAmount.description: The maximum number of idle sessions. After you specify a value for this parameter, auto scale-out is triggered only if the number of idle sessions in the delivery group is smaller than the specified value and the session usage exceeds the value specified for `ScalingUsageThreshold`. Otherwise, the system determines that idle sessions in the delivery group are sufficient and does not perform auto scale-out.`` You can use this parameter to flexibly manage auto scaling and reduce costs.

ScalingStep.description: The number of resources that are created each time resources are scaled out. Valid values: 1 to 10.

ScalingUsageThreshold.description: The upper limit of session usage. If the session usage exceeds the specified upper limit, auto scale-out is triggered. The session usage is calculated by using the following formula: `Session usage = Number of current sessions/(Total number of resources × Number of concurrent sessions) × 100%`.

ScalingDownAfterIdleMinutes.description: The duration for which no session is connected. Unit: minutes. If no session is connected in the resources after the specified duration elapses, auto scale-in is triggered. Default value: 5.

RecurrenceSchedules.description: The intervals at which the scaling policy is executed.

items.description: The interval at which the scaling policy is executed.

RecurrenceType.description:
The schedule type of the scaling policy. This parameter must be configured together with `RecurrenceValues`.``

Valid value:

*   weekly: The scaling policy is executed on specific days each week.

RecurrenceValues.description: The days of each week on which the scaling policy is executed.

items.description:
The day of each week on which the scaling policy is executed.

Valid values:

*   1: Monday
*   2: Tuesday
*   3: Wednesday
*   4: Thursday
*   5: Friday
*   6: Saturday
*   7: Sunday

TimerPeriods.description: The time periods during which the scaling policy can be executed.

items.description: The time period during which the scaling policy can be executed.

EndTime.description: The time when the scaling policy ends. Format: HH:mm.

StartTime.description: The time when the scaling policy starts. Format: HH:mm.

StrategyDisableDate.description: The expiration date of the scaling policy. Format: yyyy-MM-dd.

StrategyEnableDate.description: The effective date of the scaling policy. Format: yyyy-MM-dd.

WarmUp.description: Indicates whether resource prefetch is enabled.

NodeTypeName.description: The name of the resource specification.

SpecId.description: The specification ID that uniquely corresponds to the ID of the delivery group.

SessionTimeout.description: The duration for which sessions are retained after disconnection. Unit: minutes. After an end user disconnects from a session, the session is closed only after the specified duration elapses. If you want to permanently retain sessions, set this parameter to `-1`. Valid values:-1 and 3 to 300. Default value: `15`.

AppInstanceGroupName.description: The name of the delivery group.

ExpiredTime.description: The time when the delivery group expires.

OtaInfo.description: The information about the over-the-air (OTA) update task.

NewOtaVersion.title: 新ota版本,为空表示没有新版本
NewOtaVersion.description: The new OTA version. A null value indicates that no new version is available.

TaskId.title: 任务id
TaskId.description: The ID of the OTA update task.

OsType.title: 系统类型
OsType.description:
The type of the operating system.

Valid value:

*   Windows

ResourceStatus.description:
The resource status.

Valid values:

*   AVAILABLE
*   RELEASED
*   EXPIRED_IN\_7\_DAYS
*   UNAVAILABLE
*   UPGRADING
*   CREATING

ChargeResourceMode.description:
The sales mode.

Valid values:

*   AppInstance: by session
*   Node: by resource

SkipUserAuthCheck.description:
Indicates whether user permission verification is skipped.

Valid values:

*   true
*   false: This is the default value.

ResourceTags.title: 资源标签列表。请使用Tags字段。

items.title: 资源标签。
items.description: The resource tag.

Scope.title:
标签类型。取值范围：
Custom：自定义标签。
System：系统标签。
Scope.description: The tag type. Valid values: Custom System

Scope.title:
标签类型。取值范围：
Custom：自定义标签。
System：系统标签。

Specifies whether to enable automatic payment.

*   false: manual payment. This is the default value.
The subscription duration of resources. This parameter must be configured together with `PeriodUnit`.

The unit of the subscription duration. This parameter must be configured together with `Period`. The following items describe valid values for the combinations of `Period` and `PeriodUnit`:

*   1 Week
*   1 Month
*   2 Month
*   3 Month
*   6 Month
*   1 Year
*   2 Year
*   3 Year

>  The value of this parameter is case-insensitive. For example, `Week` is valid and `week` is invalid. If you specify a value combination other than the preceding combinations, such as `2 Week`, the operation can still be called. However, an error occurs when you place the order.

**

**Warning** After the image is updated, the end user session accessing the cloud application will be disconnected. Exercise caution to avoid end user data loss.

>  After the image of the delivery group is updated, the change takes effect on the terminal in approximately 2 minutes.

ModifyAppInstanceGroupAttribute.summary: Modifies the general policies of a delivery group, including the number of concurrent sessions and the retention period of disconnected sessions.

schema.description:
The product type.

Valid value:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming
The ID of the delivery group.
The name of the delivery group.

The duration for which sessions are retained after disconnection. Unit: minutes. After an end user disconnects from a session, the session is closed only after the specified duration elapses. If you want to permanently retain sessions, set this parameter to `-1`. Valid values:-1 and 3 to 300. Default value: `15`.
The information about the resource group.

NodePoolId.description: The ID of the resource group.

NodeCapacity.description:
The maximum number of sessions to which a resource can connect at the same time. If a resource connects to a large number of sessions at the same time, user experience can be compromised. The value range varies based on the resource type. The following items describe the value ranges of different resource types:

*   appstreaming.general.4c8g: 1 to 2
*   appstreaming.general.8c16g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c16g.4g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.8c31g.16g: 1 to 4
*   appstreaming.vgpu.14c93g.12g: 1 to 6

schema.description:

*   OFF: disables the pre-open mode. This is the default value.
The application ID of the pre-open application. If you set `PreOpenMode` to `SINGLE_APP`, you cannot leave this parameter empty.``

Specifies whether only one application can be opened in a session.

*   After you enable this feature, the system assigns a session to each application if you open multiple applications in a delivery group. This consumes a larger number of sessions.

Valid values:

*   false

The network settings.

schema.title: 产品类型
schema.description: 产品类型。

schema.title: 按资源售卖的，单个节点允许运行的应用实例数

NodeAmount.description:
购买资源的数量。取值范围：1~100。

> 
- 若为包年包月资源，则该参数不可修改。
- 若为按量付费资源，则当弹性模式（`StrategyType`）为固定数量（`NODE_FIXED`）或自动扩缩容（`NODE_SCALING_BY_USAGE`）时该参数可修改。

ScalingUsageThreshold.title: 触发弹性扩容的会话百分比

StrategyEnableDate.description: 策略生效日期。格式为：yyyy-MM-dd。该日期必须大于或等于当前日期。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

StrategyDisableDate.description: 策略失效日期。格式为：yyyy-MM-dd。失效日期与生效日期的间隔必须介于7天到1年之间（含7天和1年）。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

WarmUp.description: 是否开启资源预热策略。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

RecurrenceSchedules.description: 策略执行周期列表。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

items.description: 策略执行周期。

RecurrenceType.description: 策略执行周期的类型。必须同时指定`RecurrenceType`和`RecurrenceValues`。

enumValueTitles.weekly: 周（每周指定几天重复执行一次定时任务）

RecurrenceValues.description: 策略执行周期的数值列表。

items.description: 策略执行周期的数值。

TimerPeriods.description:
策略执行周期的时间段列表。时间段设置要求：

- 最多可添加3个时间段。
- 时间段之间不重叠。
- 时间段之间的间隔大于或等于5分钟。
- 单个时间段的时长大于或等于15分钟。
- 所有时间段累计不跨天。

items.description: 策略执行周期的时间段。

ListAppInstances.summary: Queries the details of application instances in a delivery group, including the IDs, status, creation time, update time, session status, and public IP addresses associated with the primary NICs of the instances.

schema.description: The ID of the delivery group.
The ID of the application instance.
The status of the application instances.

items.description:
The status of the application instance.

Valid values:

*   INIT: The application instance is being initialized.
*   STARTING: The application instance is being started.
*   CLOSING: The application instance is being stopped.
*   CLOSED: The application instance is closed.
*   RUNNING: The application instance is running.
*   idle: The application instance is idle.
*   BOUND: The application instance is bound to an application instance group.
*   UNAVAILABLE: The application instance is unavailable.

schema.description: The IDs of the application instances. Up to 100 IDs can be specified.

items.description: The ID of the application instance.

schema.description: The number of entries per page. The value cannot be greater than `100`. Default value: `20`. We recommend that you specify this parameter.
The page number. Default value: `1`. We recommend that you specify this parameter.

Specifies whether to query the information about deleted app instances. If you set this parameter to true, you must configure AppInstanceIdList. Otherwise, a parameter error is reported.

Valid values:

*   true
*   false
The user IDs. You can specify up to 100 IDs.

items.description: The user ID.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

PageSize.description: The number of entries returned on each page. The value cannot be greater than `100`. We recommend that you configure this parameter.

PageNumber.description: The page number of the returned page. We recommend that you configure this parameter.

items.description: The app instance.

AppInstanceId.description: The ID of the application instance.

AppInstanceGroupId.description: The ID of the delivery group.

Status.description: The status of the application instance.

MainEthPublicIp.description: The public IP address associated with the primary NIC. This value is returned only if `StrategyType` is set to `Mixed`.

GmtCreate.description: The time when the application instance was created.

GmtModified.description: The time when the application instance was updated.

SessionStatus.description:
The session status. This parameter is returned only if the application instance is in the `RUNNING` state.

Valid values:

*   disconnect: disconnected
*   connect: connected

BindInfo.description: The information about the binding between the application instance and end users.

EndUserId.description: The ID of the end user that is bound to the application instance.

UsageDuration.description: The use duration of the application instance. Unit: seconds.

NodeId.description:
The ID of the node on which the app instance runs.

>  This parameter is returned only if the ChargeResourceMode parameter of the delivery group to which the app instance belongs is set to Node.

ChargeType.description:
The billing method of the app instance. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription.
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go

>  This parameter is returned only if the ChargeResourceMode parameter of the delivery group to which the app instance belongs is set to Node.

GetConnectionTicket.summary: Queries the credential that is used to connect to App Streaming.

schema.description:
The product type.

Valid values:

*   CloudApp: App Streaming
*   AndroidCloud: Cloud Phone
The ID of the convenience account.

The region ID.

>  If you configure this parameter, the system assigns application instances only among the delivery groups that reside in the specified region.

The task ID.

>  This parameter is required for calls other than the first call to this operation. You can use this parameter to query the task status and connection credential.

The application ID.

>  This parameter is required for the first call to this operation and optional for subsequent calls to the operation.

The application version. If you configure this parameter, only an application of the specified version is started. If you do not configure this parameter, an application of a random authorized version is started.
The parameters that are configured to start the application. For information about how to obtain these parameters, see [Obtain parameters configured to install and start an application](~~426045~~).

The delivery groups.

> *   If you configure this parameter, the system assigns application instances only among the specified authorized delivery groups. 
> *   This parameter is required if you configure `AppInstanceId` or `AppInstancePersistentId`.

items.description: The ID of the delivery group.

schema.description: The ID of the persistent session.

The ID of the application instance.

> *   If you configure this parameter, the system attempts to assign only the specified application instance.
> *   If you configure this parameter, you must also configure `AppInstanceGroupIdList` and the number of delivery groups specified by `AppInstanceGroupIdList` must be 1.

schema.title:
接入类型，不传表示两种都显示。
取值范围：
互联网：INTERNET
专线：VPC
Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

TaskStatus.description:
The task status.

Valid values:

*   Finished: The task is complete.
*   Failed: The task failed.
*   Running: The task is being executed.

Ticket.description:
The credential that is used to connect to App Streaming.

>  This parameter is displayed for calls other than the first call to this operation.

AppInstanceGroupId.description: The ID of the delivery group.

AppInstancePersistentId.description: The ID of the persistent session.

AppInstanceId.description: The ID of the application instance.

OsType.description:
The operating system.

Valid value:

*   Windows: the Windows operating system

TenantId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

GetConnectionTicket.title: GetConnectionTicket
GetConnectionTicket.description:
You must call this operation at least twice to obtain a connection credential.

The first time you call this operation, the system assigns an application instance to the specified convenience account and then starts the application. In this case, the ID of the started task, which is indicated by `TaskID`, is returned.

In subsequent calls, you must configure `TaskID` to query whether the task is completed. If the value of `TaskStatus` in the response is `Finished`, the connection credential, which is indicated by `Ticket`, is returned.

>  Replace `<https://wuying.aliyun.com/appMyBank>` based on your actual business.

ListTagCloudResources.title: ListTagCloudResources

TagCloudResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to cloud resources and updates the values of existing cloud resource tags.

schema.title:
资源类型。取值范围：
AliUid：租户 
AppId：应用ID
AppInstanceGroupId：交付组
WyId：用户

资源ID列表，最多支持50个
资源类型为租户的时候不需要指定。

自定义（Custom+指定范围的System）标签列表，最多支持10个
● 标签键长度范围：1~128 个字符。
● 标签值长度范围：1~128 个字符。
● 区分大小写。
● 同一个资源上的同一个标签键只能对应一个标签值。如果您尝试添加已有标签键，则对应的标签值会更新为新值。

TagCloudResources.title: TagCloudResources

schema.title:
资源类型。取值范围：
AliUid：租户 
AppId：应用ID
AppInstanceGroupId：交付组
WyId：用户
schema.description:
The type of the resource from which you want to remove tags.

Valid values:

*   AppId: app ID.
*   WyId: Alibaba Cloud Workspace user ID.
*   AppInstanceGroupId: delivery group ID.
*   AliUid: tenant ID.

schema.title:
资源ID列表，最多支持50个
资源类型为租户的时候不需要指定。
schema.description: The resource IDs. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs. You do not need to specify this parameter if you set ResourceType to AliUid.

items.title: 资源ID
items.description: The resource ID.

schema.title: 自定义（Custom+指定范围的System）标签键列表，最多支持10个
schema.description:
The tags that you want to remove from the cloud resources. System and custom tags are supported. You can specify up to 10 tags.

Valid values for system tags:

*   `System/Scheduler/GRAYSCALE`: canary tags.
*   `System/Scheduler/STOP_NEW_USER_CONNECTION`: tags used to stop new users bound to the delivery group from establishing a connection.

items.title: 标签键
items.description: The tag key. The value must be 1 to 128 characters in length and is case-sensitive.
